title: Aatrox needs a way to boost his movement speed
body:
Many champions have a way to do it..Garen, Gangplank, Mundo....but Aatrox NEEDS it to keep auto attacking.

I propose that every hit of Blood Price gives Aatrox 5 movement speed for 5 seconds, stacking up 2/3/4 times. Just someting to reward him for landing consecutive blood price hits and help him chase someone down.

He lacks:

A reliable movement ability
A way to boost movement speed
Built in Crits, %health damage, armor pen or significant magic damage
Built in resistances or a way to block, parry or reduce incoming damage

You won't find any other champion  in the game that is lacking all of those things. Only Aatrox. He has the most bare bones kit in the game. The things he has, tons of champions have--a way to boost attack speed, a way to heal, a way to defy death...Volibear does that better and Zac makes enemy have to actively do things to stop his revive, which forces a choice in team fights. 

It is his kit, so to say he doesnt need improvements on the things he is lacking is nonsense.
